template.name: tabled
template.value:
class $TABLE$(Base): __tablename__ = '$TABLE_NAME$'
$TABLE_NAME$_id = Column(INTEGER, primary_key=True) name = Column(VARCHAR(24), unique=True, nullable=False) description = Column(TEXT, nullable=False) $END$

template.name: tablej
template.value:
class $TABLE$(Base): __tablename__ = '$TABLE_NAME$'
$TABLE_NAME$_id = Column(INTEGER, ForeignKey($TABLE$.$TABLENAME$_id), primary_key=True, nullable=False) $TABLE_NAME$_id = Column(INTEGER, ForeignKey($TABLE$.$TABLENAME$_id), primary_key=True, nullable=False) $END$
